title: Custom huds
body: Hello and today I would like to change my huds but can I get me banned for if or any sort of consequence fro doing something like that?

replies.body: If you're trying to use some kind of [**third party program**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), keep in mind that there could be something dangerous attached to those files which could possibly harm your pc. If you're trying to edit the game files, I'd not suggest doing so since that could also end up breaking your game installation.
